mapper.sql: DATA_RULE_ID, TAB_NAME, COL_NAME, RULE_OPERATOR, COL_VALUE, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT(m.DATA_RULE_ID),m.* FROM SYS_DATA_RULE m LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION_DATA_RULES_REL pmr ON pmr.DATA_RULE_ID = m.DATA_RULE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION p ON p.PERMISSION_CODE = pmr.PERMISSION_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE_PERMISSION_REF rpr ON rpr.PERMISSION_CODE = p.PERMISSION_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE r ON r.ROLE_CODE = rpr.ROLE_CODE left join SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF prr on prr.ROLE_CODE=r.ROLE_CODE left join SYS_USER_POSITION_REF upr on upr.POSITION_CODE=prr.POSITION_CODE LEFT JOIN SYS_USER u ON u.USER_CODE = upr.USER_CODE WHERE m.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND pmr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND p.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND rpr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND r.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND prr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND upr.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND u.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND u.ACCOUT = #{accout} AND m.TAB_NAME in
#{item}

select a.data_rule_id dataRuleId, a.tab_name tabName, a.col_name colName, a.rule_operator ruleOperator, a.col_value colValue, a.status_cd statusCd from sys_data_rule a where a.status_cd = '1000'
and fileName like '%'||#{search}||'%'

SELECT A.ITEM_CNNAME FROM TB_DICTIONARY_ITEM A, TB_DICTIONARY B WHERE A.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND B.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND A.DICTIONARY_ID = B.DICTIONARY_ID AND B.DICTIONARY_NAME='RULE_OPERATOR' AND A.ITEM_VALUE=#{itemValue}
